title: The OnePlus Nord N20 is coming to North America with an AMOLED display and an iPhone-esque design
content:
The OnePlus Nord N20 leaked all the way back in November of 2021, nearly six months ago now. We haven’t heard anything about it since then, though we already got a sense of what the phone will eventually look like. It was capitalizing on the iPhone-lookalike trend that a few other OEMs jumped in on

The post The OnePlus Nord N20 is coming to North America with an AMOLED display and an iPhone-esque design appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The OnePlus Nord N20 is coming to North America with an AMOLED display and a design that's a little bit reminiscent of the iPhone 13.
